summary: A simple retexture of UNP\'s original hands which sports colored nail polish with matching toenails, available so far: Black, White, Red, Pink, Cyan.  If you like this mod, I encourage you to post a screenshot of your character with your brand new nails (of course an endorsment would be greatly appreciated as well). Now it includes better meshes fo
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/28243-1-1356571836.jpg[/img]

[b][size=5][color=red]2000+[/color] Total Downloads 
[color=red]1000+[/color] Unique[/size][/b]
Thank you guys :)

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Version_zps3eca453f.jpg[/img]

1.5

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Description_zpsd5aebd43.jpg[/img]

A retexture of UNP\'s and CBBE\'s original hands and bodies which sports colored nail polish with matching toenails, available so far: [i][color=black]Black,[/color] White, [color=red]Red,[/color] [color=pink]Pink,[/color] [color=cyan]Cyan.[/color][/i] If you like this mod, I encourage you to post a screenshot of your character with your brand new nails (of course an endorsment would be greatly appreciated as well).

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_ChangeLog_zpsf1ef8cda.jpg[/img]

1.0 
Initial release.
1.1
Added textures for toenails.
1.2
Added CBBE version for both Black or White Nails/Toenails.
1.3
Optimized the textures of all colored nails, now much less V-Ram consuming, quality is unchanged.
Added Red Color for both UNP and CBBE.
1.4	
Fixed some CBBE textures which were not properly optimized.
Repackaged All files in a single zip.
Added Pink and Cyan Color for both UNP and CBBE.
1.5
Now includes \"Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB\" by MrTroubleMaker

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Installation_zps65c9502d.jpg[/img]

Open the \"Colored Nails.7z\" and choose your color and body mod.
Extract the content of that folder to: Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\female
If you use UNP you can drop in your data files even the mesh folder and overwrite if asked.

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Notes_zps68e092e4.jpg[/img]

This is a texture replacer for females only and it is based on \"Dimon99\'s UNP Body 1d6Pubic2 variant\" or \"Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-\".

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Credits_zps5740cbb7.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP Female Body[/url] by Dimon99
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-.[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30179/]Better Hand Mesh for UNP/UNPB[/url] by MrTroubleMaker

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_LocalizedVersion_zpsdb1af4de.jpg[/img]

[url=http://tes-world.ru/load/cvetnye_nogti/14-1-0-1077]Russian Version[/url]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_MyOtherMods_zps11728575.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27743]Spell - Brilliance[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28243]Colored Nails[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28431/]Enhanced Lydia[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28457/]Magistrate Eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28588/]Improved Soultrap[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28684]Daedric Letters Warpaints[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29543/]Merchant Stock Respawn Fix[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29600/]Spell - Levitate[/url]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Contact_zpsb87a9a46.jpg[/img]
[url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1431595-relz-colored-nails/]Magistrate on Bethesda\'s Forum.[/url]
Magistrate on Nexus.[/center]
